name: MDB Consulting
overview:
MDB Consulting create bespoke software solutions using web and mobile technologies.

MDB specialise in using the latest Microsoft products and technologies, combined with consultancy to streamline inefficient and redundant business processes.

MDB’s core skills centre around the use of database and systems integration technologies, such as Microsoft SQL Server databases and Web Services to aggregate and centralise business data.

Data is then converted into valuable management information and reports, facilitating access via mobile devices and web portals.

MDB aim to convert legacy systems, unused data and paper-based processes into meaningful, up-to-date and accurate information on which businesses can measure, monitor and optimise their performance.

MDB have in-house web developers, designers and software programmers as well as business analysts to help deliver a comprehensive software solution for clients.
